alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN CAMDEN AND SOUTH CENTRAL GLYNN COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Bay Base, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Kings Bay Base, Jekyll Island, Cumberland Island, Harrietts Bluff, and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
